body.name: Ximytec 20W USB C Fast Charger [MFi Certified] Compatible with iPhone 15/15 Plus/ 15 Pro/ 15 Pro Max/iPad Pro, 2Pack PD Type C Charger Blocks with 6FT USB C to C Cable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 50 mins
features: 【3X Fast Charging】 : 20W power delivery USB-C charger with 6ft usbc to usbc cable provide Max 20W output power,charge your phone up to 50% in 30 minutes, which saves more than 1 hour for you, when compared to standard USB charger.

【60W USB-C to USB-C Cable】: With original Chip, Ximytec type c PD adapter and typec to typec cord full support with OS versions and all future updates. They adopt the latest and faster charging terminal design,and built-in overvoltage protection ensure your devices are charged safely, rapid Charging at 60W Maximum.

【Excellent Safety Fast Charging】: Ximytec's 20W power delivery fast chargers have bulit-in multi-protection system, avoiding from over-voltage, over-current,short-circuit, over-heat, etc. They are certified by UL, ETL, FCC, CE, ROHS.MFi Certified cables come with surge protection and other advanced safety features to keep your device safe, Maximize the life of your Device.

【Wide Compatibility】:20W PD adapter wall plugs support power delivery fast charge,compatible with new iPhone 15/15 Pro/15 Pro Max/15 Plus,iPad Pro 12.9 inch 6th/5th/4th/3th Generation (2022/2021/2020/2018), iPad Pro 11 inch 4rd/3rd/2rd/1rd Generation (2022/2021/2020/2018), iPad Air 5th/4th generation (2022/2020),iPad 10th Generation (2022), iPad Mini 6th Generation (2021) .They can also fast charge for USB C enabled smartphones, compatible with Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel and more.

【What You Get】: 2PACK USB C Wall Chargers and 2PACK 6ft type c to type c cords, which have a hassle-free lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will resolve your issue within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2Pack USB C Fast Chargers & 6ft USB C to C Cables Compatible with iPhone 15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max Power Delivery Fast Charging:Charge your phone to 100% in less time—that’s up to 3× faster than with other standard charger.Compact：Take these PD Fast charger with you wherever you go thanks to the miniature design.

Advanced Safety The Ximytec USB-C PD fast adapters protect your device from overcurrent, over-voltage, short-circuit, and overheating, UL/ETL/MFi certified Chargers can match the current required by the device automatically,charge the device fast,safely,and steadily. Excellent Durability The USB C to USB C Cords have undergone rigorous laboratory testing and can withstand more than 20,000 bends.Super flexibility and high-quality materials make them withstand the wear and tear of daily connections without worrying about entanglement. Easy to Carrry The fast charger packs a total of 20 W power into its compact form. It is easy to carry anywhere. Keep your devices charged at home, in the office, or on the go.

Wide Compatibility: Compatible With iPhone 15 / 15 Plus / 15 Pro / 15 Pro MaxCompatible With iPad Pro 12.9 inch 6th/5th/4th/3th Generation (2022/2021/2020/2018)Compatible With iPad Pro 11 inch 4rd/3rd/2rd/1rd Generation (2022/2021/2020/2018)Compatible With iPad Air 5th/4th generation (2022/2020)Compatible With ,iPad 10th Generation (2022)/iPad Mini 6th Generation (2021)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this USB C fast charger
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with my purchase,the USB C to C Charger and 6ft cable are as strong and durable as described.I bought it to charge my iPone 15,and in fact it can also be used for Android devices.The 20W wall charger charges very quickly,much faster than the original cord,and far exceeded my expectations in terms of performance.It is compatible with iPhone 15 and iPad Pro,Air and Mini series of IOS devices and Android devices .As long as it is USB C to C,it is compatible and is very convenient to use.The 2 wall chargers are equipped with two 6ft long cables.This length is flexible and convenient.You don't have to worry about charging problems even if you are far from the socket.The quality of the product is excellent and can withstand daily use.The price of the two-pack is also very cost-effective.I put one charging cable in the room and one in the living room so that I can charge more conveniently ,which is very suitable for my daily charging needs.All in all,this USB C fast charger is reliable and efficient,and is a great value for money.I give it 5 stars and will buy it again if necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is exatly the fast charger I need
reviews.reviewText: After receiving this charger,I have used it for a while.Its charging speed is indeed fast,the overall sense of use is not bad,and the connecting computer is used to transmit files smoothly.This iPhone fast charger has Apple's MFI certification.The general Type-C interface can be used to charge my iPhone 15,or it can also charge Android phones.The compatibility and security are excellent.The length of the cable is 6ft.I like it very much because I am used to lying on the bed to play with my iPhone.The length of 6ft is just right.It can be seen that the material of the charge block and the charge cable is relatively durable,and it is no problem if you accidentally fall a few times.The most important point is that it is affordable and cheap.The two sets of fast chargers are suitable for use in daily lift or emergency use.If necessary,I will buy it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and great price!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing purchase!! Comparable with the iPhone 15. No issues whatsoever. One day shipping.

reviews.reviewText: One cord failed. The other is failing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great iphone 15 charger,worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: My home has many Apple's products because Apple's products are very goods.My phone is iPhone 15,my wift is iPhone 15 pro,my daughter uses iPhone 15 pro max,and I alseo have an iPad.I have purchased many chargers and cables,but unfortunately,most of them quickly broke.I accidentally saw this product on Amazon.This product includes charger and cable ,which are very cheap ,so I bought it.I am so very happy I purchased this product.The white shell of the charger is small and suitable for carrying when traveling.It's similar to Apple's charger,excpt that it's USB C connector is vertical.Not only does it have a beautiful appearace,but it also charges quickly.It belongs to fast charger.It can charge my phone from 10% to 50% in less than half an hour,which is a result I didn't expect.The chargers I used before can't do it,It will save me a lot of time, and I can use the saved time to do more things that I enjoy doing.His quality is very good,and the charging is stable.The time it takes to fully charge my iPhone is basically the same.The length of lightning cable is 6 ft,3 ft is too short,and 10 ft is too long.This length is very good.I can play with my iPhone or my Ipay while charging .I like this life.The cable is also white ,just like the charger,which looks very nice.The merchant said that after 20000+times of bending and strict testing leaving the factory,I couldn't verify its authenticity,but the quality is still very good.I have been using it for several months, and I feel strong and durable,except for being a bit dirty,it looks like new.Beautiful appearance,excellent quality ,and cheap price.This is a very good product that deserves our praise,recommendation, and purchase. Great!Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charger seems fast as described
reviews.reviewText: Just received this inexpensive charger. My Motorola stylus G went from 20% to 90% in about one hour. The phone recognized that it was in the Turbocharge mode also. That's good enough for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these because of the reviews. Big mistake. Neither of them fit my iphone 15 - I had to jam the cord into the block as it barely fit and did not fit my phones at all. Next time I'll buy something with more reviews. Stay away from this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This charger charges slow for my phone and charges up to 81. It does not go past 81 on some days and on other days , it doesn’t go past 71.
